com.oracle.sfp.scripting.api

Interface IActualPlusLoanAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPeriod, IPlusLoanAPI<IActualPlusLoanAPI>, IScriptingObject

    public interface IActualPlusLoanAPI
extends IPlusLoanAPI<IActualPlusLoanAPI>, IPeriod
    A (Graduate or Parent) PLUS loan. It is an IPeriod determined by the AwardRangeRequestedStartDate and AwardRangeRequestedEndDate in the latest accepted application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> T getAccepted(Function<? super ICrcsInfoAPI,? extends T> crcsGetter, Function<? super ICrspInfoAPI,? extends T> crspGetter)
      Allows searching coherently for a value from the latest accepted source record, be it a CRCS or a CRSP.
      <T> T getAccepted(Function<? super IPlusCodInfoAPI,? extends T> getter)
      Allows searching coherently for a value from the latest accepted source record, be it a CRCS or a CRSP.
      ICrcsInfoAPI getAcceptedCrcs()
      Gets the latest accepted CRCS record for the latest accepted application.
      ICrspInfoAPI getAcceptedCrsp()
      Gets the CRSP record for the latest accepted application but only if it has an accepted status.
      BigDecimal getAcceptedLoanAmount()
      Gets the application amount, which will be the EndorserAmount if there is an accepted CRSC or the ApplicationLoanAmount in the CRSP if there is an accepted CRSP.
      List<IPlusCodInfoAPI> getApplicationRecords()
      Gets the relevant records for the latest loan application.
      LocalDate getCreditDecisionExpirationDate()
      Gets the latest received Credit Decision Expiration Date.
      ICrspInfoAPI getCrsp()
      Gets the CRSP record for the latest accepted application.
      String getFundCode(int acyNo)
      Gets the fund code for this loan in a given academic year.
      IPlusCodInfoAPI getLatestAcceptedResponse()
      Gets the latest accepted response record for the latest accepted application.
      Integer getLatestPackagePriority(int acyNo)
      Gets relative priority order in latest package.
      Boolean getMaximumLoanIndicator()
      Gets the Maximum Loan Indicator from the CRSP if this is not overridden by a later accepted CRCS.
      BigDecimal getPreviousAcysTotal()
      Gets total amount of this loan used by previous academic years.
      LocalDate getProcessDate()
      Gets latest reference process date for the loan.
      BigDecimal getRemainingLoanAmount()
      Gets the remaining loan amount not used by previous academic years.
      boolean isDenied()
      Checks if the latest CRSP of this loan is rejected and it has not received yet an accepted CRCS.
      boolean isExpired()
      Checks if the Credit Decision Expiration Date comes before the start of the loan period being evaluated.
      IActualPlusLoanAPI withForceProjected(boolean forceProjected)
      Returns a copy of this object with the given Force Projected flag.

    • Method Detail

      • isDenied

        boolean isDenied()
        Checks if the latest CRSP of this loan is rejected and it has not received yet an accepted CRCS.
        Returns:
        the result of the check.

      • getFundCode

        @Nonnull
String getFundCode(int acyNo)
        Gets the fund code for this loan in a given academic year. The fund code may vary in whether there will be a fund code extension due e.g. to legacy funds.
        Parameters:
        acyNo - the academic year number.
        Returns:
        the records.

      • getLatestPackagePriority

        @Nullable
Integer getLatestPackagePriority(int acyNo)
        Gets relative priority order in latest package. Lower numbers were packaged first.
        Parameters:
        acyNo - the academic year number to consider.
        Returns:
        the priority.

      • getProcessDate

        @Nonnull
LocalDate getProcessDate()
        Gets latest reference process date for the loan.
        Returns:
        the date.

      • getPreviousAcysTotal

        @Nonnull
BigDecimal getPreviousAcysTotal()
        Gets total amount of this loan used by previous academic years.
        Returns:
        the amount.

      • getAcceptedLoanAmount

        @Nullable
BigDecimal getAcceptedLoanAmount()
        Gets the application amount, which will be the EndorserAmount if there is an accepted CRSC or the ApplicationLoanAmount in the CRSP if there is an accepted CRSP.
        Returns:
        the amount - or null if undefined (see getMaximumLoanIndicator()).

      • getRemainingLoanAmount

        @Nullable
BigDecimal getRemainingLoanAmount()
        Gets the remaining loan amount not used by previous academic years.
        Returns:
        the amount - or null if getAcceptedLoanAmount() is null.

      • getMaximumLoanIndicator

        @Nullable
Boolean getMaximumLoanIndicator()
        Gets the Maximum Loan Indicator from the CRSP if this is not overridden by a later accepted CRCS.
        Returns:
        the indicator.

      • getCreditDecisionExpirationDate

        @Nonnull
LocalDate getCreditDecisionExpirationDate()
        Gets the latest received Credit Decision Expiration Date.
        Returns:
        the date.

      • isExpired

        boolean isExpired()
        Checks if the Credit Decision Expiration Date comes before the start of the loan period being evaluated.
        Returns:
        the result of the check.

      • getApplicationRecords

        @Nonnull
List<IPlusCodInfoAPI> getApplicationRecords()
        Gets the relevant records for the latest loan application.
        Returns:
        the records.

      • getCrsp

        @Nonnull
ICrspInfoAPI getCrsp()
        Gets the CRSP record for the latest accepted application. Notice that the CRSP itself might not have an accepted status.
        Returns:
        the CRSP.

      • getAcceptedCrsp

        @Nullable
ICrspInfoAPI getAcceptedCrsp()
        Gets the CRSP record for the latest accepted application but only if it has an accepted status. Returns null otherwise.
        Returns:
        the CRSP or null.

      • getAcceptedCrcs

        @Nullable
ICrcsInfoAPI getAcceptedCrcs()
        Gets the latest accepted CRCS record for the latest accepted application. Returns null if there is no such record.
        Returns:
        the CRCS.

      • getLatestAcceptedResponse

        @Nullable
IPlusCodInfoAPI getLatestAcceptedResponse()
        Gets the latest accepted response record for the latest accepted application. Returns null if there is no such record.
        Returns:
        the record.

      • getAccepted

        @Nullable
<T> T getAccepted(@Nonnull
                            Function<? super ICrcsInfoAPI,? extends T> crcsGetter,
                            @Nonnull
                            Function<? super ICrspInfoAPI,? extends T> crspGetter)
        Allows searching coherently for a value from the latest accepted source record, be it a CRCS or a CRSP.
        Parameters:
        crcsGetter - the getter for the value having an accepted CRCS as the source
        crspGetter - the getter for the value having an accepted CRSP as the source
        Returns:
        the value, if found, or null otherwise.

      • getAccepted

        @Nullable
<T> T getAccepted(@Nonnull
                            Function<? super IPlusCodInfoAPI,? extends T> getter)
        Allows searching coherently for a value from the latest accepted source record, be it a CRCS or a CRSP.
        Parameters:
        getter - the getter for the value applicable to both CRCSes or CRSPs.
        Returns:
        the value, if found, or null otherwise.

      • withForceProjected

        @Nonnull
IActualPlusLoanAPI withForceProjected(boolean forceProjected)
        Returns a copy of this object with the given Force Projected flag. If this is set to true, the fund status of the corresponding PLUS instance in the generated package will be forced to be projected.
        Parameters:
        forceProjected - the flag.
        Returns:
        the copy with the given flag.
